version.changes: • Fixed: failure to load a native DLL on older systems • Use of https protocol for news and updates • Verifies digital signature of downloaded update file • Added ability to disable web updates using an installer command line option
• Fixed error with Compare when aligning columns

• Added new Review feature • Added new 'Insights' sheet to OAK map • Added new 'Trace dependents' feature • Added pruning for new Excel 365 functions • Summary and Compare report books also include RC addresses • OAK Reconstruct & Formula Explorer support 3D formulas • Formula Explorer and pruner support @ symbols • Redesigned Pruner UI • Redesigned convert references UI • Formula explorer now has guidelines and the triangle colors can be customized • Login fail error message is now copyable • Fixed 'stop running this script' issue with custom task panes • Fixed some language issues with the Formula Explorer • Fixed issue where unchecking all sheets on a custom task pane would automatically reselect them • Removed Formula Walker tool

•Improvements on the Formula Explorer: formula wrapping, window automatically collapsing, performance improvements. •New feature: Formula Explorer offers a 'drill' mode which breaks down Excel functions by arguments. •Improvement: the Precedents Navigation tools now handle protected workbook structure (with hidden sheets). •Improvement: the OAK parser recognizes 35 new Excel 365 functions. •Improvement: Formula Explorer, Precedents Navigation and Fan Out Precedents are now fully compatible with 3D formulas. •Fixed: bug where OAK would randomly log out the user. •Fixed: bug where the Compare tool would break when setting range colour fails. •Fixed: bug where toggling visibility of addresses and Labels would crash the Formula Explorer. •Fixed: bug where some windows would not scale correctly.

•Improvements on the Formula Explorer: formula wrapping, window automatically collapsing, performance improvements. •Added Ctrl + Alt + F5 to list of Excel shortcuts. •Fixed: bug where 'About OAK' crashes Excel if the user does not have an active license. •Fixed: trial window no longer showing if valid login credentials are detected.
•Fixed: Compare automatic sheets matching now disabled. •Fixed: 'Forgot password' link is now invoking correct interface.

•New feature: The Formula Explorer is a UI-based tool designed to make navigation and formula auditing easy •New feature: Precedents Navigation - an alternative method to trace precedents of a formula without the need of a UI •New trial mechanism that does not require any login credentials •Performance improvements and bug fixes
•Fixed: Compare is now able to to compare two sheets on the same workbook •Fixed: Compare is now able to compare workbooks with different number of worksheets •Performance improvements and bug fixes

•New set of Utility tools (Colors, Casing, Switch Signs, Convert References) •New module for keyboard shortcuts •Improvements on the dynamic arrays compatibility •F1 disable key functionality •Combined per-user / machine-level installer • Performance improvements and bug fixes

• Optimize / Reconstruct / Prune now modified to handle dynamic arrays • Formula Walker now recognizes parent and spilled formulas • Parser is now capable of handling the implicit intersection operator @ and # suffix • 'Names' tools now compatible with dynamic arrays • Removal of aggressive optimization on the Optimize tool • Risk analysis improvements for dealing with the @ and # operators • FIPS compliant encryption compatibility • Now uses .NET Framework 4.8 • Performance improvements and bug fixes

• Replaced shortcuts macro with use of keyboard events - speeds up Excel loading time • Fixed redefine names UI • Added link addresses option to IOAKAPI.Summarize • Performance improvements and bug fixes
• Dynamic array formulas now recognized by Map, Summarize and Compare • Improvements on the licensing and authentication mechanism • Performance improvements and bug fixes
• Performance improvements on the Formula Walker and new Value column • Improvements on the authentication mechanism • Updates notification simplified
